casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY
v.
Dawn FRITZELL et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 23, 2019

The petition by the defendant Clifford D. Fritzell III for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn.App. 777, 198 A.3d 642 (2018), is denied.

ECKER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
